dmca.title: Author Complains that Google-Enhancing Tips Copied
dmca.body:
Google, Inc. 
Attn: Customer Support, DMCA Complaints 
[private]
Mountain View, CA 94043 
USA 				Fax: [private] 

Dear Google, 

Copyright Infringement Notification 

1. The copyrighted work at issue is the text that appears on 
http://www.google.com/search?hl=en&lr=&ie=UTF-8 &oe=UTF-8&q=google+optimization+example &btnG=Google+Search 

2. Identify the material that you claim is infringing the copyrighted work listed in item #1 above. 

Search Query: google optimization example
Infringing Web Pages: http://www.google.com/search?hl=en&lr=&ie=UTF-8 &oe=UTF-8&q=google+optimization+example &btnG=Google+Search 

The infringing page is at: 
Weblog.cemper.com/how-to/google-optimization-tips/ google-optimization-tips.php and also displays Adsense ads bearing someone else's reference code. 

The original page, which contains my name and a link to the article's original publication in a print publication is at: 
crm911.com/seo/google-tips.shtml Original print URL (June 2003): 
http://www.apcmag.com/apc/v3.nsf/0/ A19F985BCD8BFD5CCA256D44001A3A89 

3. My contact email is [private]

4. The owner of the infringing site appears to be: 
[private], [private] 
[private] 
Vienna 1220 
AUSTRIA 
Telephone [private] 

5. I have a good faith belief that use of the copyrighted materials described above on the allegedly infringing web pages is not authorized by the copyright owner, its agent, or the law. 

6. I swear, under penalty of perjury, that the information in the notification is accurate and that I am the copyright owner. 

7. I am known (as an Adwords consultant) by Google staff member [private] and use the name "[private]" on Webmasterworld. 

[private] 
[private] 
Werribee VIC 3030 
AUSTRALIA 
13 December 2003
